author: Ryan George
title: Ryan George
text:
I recently purchased an engagement ring for my fianc√© and had fully put my trust in Peter to design and make the ring for her.
From the consultation to the finished product I would recommend them to any one with any budget. Looking forward to them designing our wedding bands now.
Restored my faith in good customer service.
